meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ingrown.
meanings.sent1: Her ingrownness made her feel uncomfortable in social situations.
meanings.sent2: The ingrownness of the plant's roots caused it to struggle to grow properly.
meanings.sent3: The ingrownness of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: His ingrownness with the local community led to misunderstandings and conflicts.
meanings.sent5: The ingrownness of the relationship between the two countries resulted in tension and disagreements.

meanings.definition: The condition of having hair or nails that grow into the surrounding skin.
meanings.sent1: She had to visit the doctor to treat the ingrownness on her toe.
meanings.sent2: Ingrownness can be painful and cause inflammation in the affected area.
meanings.sent3: The ingrownness of his toenail made it difficult for him to wear shoes.
meanings.sent4: Dealing with ingrownness requires proper care and attention to prevent infections.
meanings.sent5: The ingrownness of the hair follicles resulted in irritation and redness on her skin.
